item.description:
Let's see a chick flick! We'll meet in the mall-side lobby between 1:15 and 1:25, then head in to take our seats for the 1:40 p.m. show. Please do not be late or you will have to find us inside the theatre.

Synopsis:

A woman (Julianne Hough) starts a new life in a small town in North Carolina and finds herself reluctantly attracted to a man (Josh Duhamel) who helps her confront her past in this Nicholas Sparks adaptation from Dear John director Lasse Hallstr√∂m.

Run time: 115 minutes
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me, Tammy, in the mall-side lobby. I wear glasses; please see my profile for a photo.
item.name: Sunday Matinee: "Safe Haven" at AMC Liberty Tree Mall in Danvers
